title: Track and Trace Assistant
job_overview:
Ready to Take the Next Step in Your Logistics Career?
Advance Your Career in Logistics with GH Logistics!

Join GH Logistics as a Track and Trace Assistant, where you’ll play a crucial role in ensuring smooth operations for our fleet and partner carriers. If you’ve worked in a domestic freight brokerage or have experience with sales, tracking and tracing, or account handling, this is your chance to ladder into supply chain management with a growing company.

About Us
GH Logistics is expanding its operations and seeking talented individuals to join our high-performing team. Our tight-knit culture values dedication, accuracy, and a commitment to operational excellence.

We are looking for full time candidates who can work for
- Wednesday - Sunday 11:00 PM - 9:00 AM San Antonio Central Time
- Wednesday - Sunday 3 PM - 1 AM San Antonio Central Time

NOTE: Before applying, ensure you are comfortable with the following:
- Can work on any US hours (CST).
- Comfortable being in a rotational shift depending on business needs
- Using Hubstaff throughout shift
- Being in the zoom throughout shift (start to end)

Apply here: Upgrade to see actual info

Paid training is provided upon completion.

Key Responsibilities
- Manage tracking and tracing of assets and carrier networks in real-time
- Record, update, and verify tracking data with precision
- Provide timely updates to customers and stakeholders
- Schedule and coordinate route assignments
- Organize carrier documentation and monitor compliance
- Maintain accurate operational schedules to ensure timely deliveries
- Collaborate with other departments and provide reporting as needed
- Support trailer management operations to ensure efficient equipment utilization
- Assist in bidding on freight loads to support brokerage growth and profitability
- Handle account management tasks to maintain strong carrier and customer relationships

What You’ll Need
- Experience in logistics, freight brokerage, or transportation tracking
- Minimum typing speed of 45 words per minute
- Strong English proficiency (spoken and written)
- Reliable internet connection and remote work setup
- Exceptional organizational and time-management skills
- Proficiency in MS Office, OneDrive, and Google applications
- Analytical and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment

What We Offer
At GH Logistics, we believe in rewarding talent and dedication. We offer:
- A collaborative, team-oriented work environment
- Opportunities to develop skills and grow your career in logistics
- Recognition for your contributions to operational excellence

Ready to join our team and make an impact?
Apply today and become part of a company that values your potential and invests in your future.
